makeplot3 a function to plot scenarios with smoothed variation ranges

makeplot3.Rd

makeplot3 a function to plot scenarios with smoothed variation ranges

Usage

makeplot3(
  dfweather,
  parameter,
  BaseSize = 18,
  ylabel = "",
  xlabel = "Datum",
  SelYear = 0,
  IsLegend = TRUE
)

Arguments

dfweather

data frame with weather data

parameter

Column to be plotted

BaseSize

Base char size for the plot

ylabel

The y label string

xlabel

The x label string

SelYear

The year to be highlighted

IsLegend

Add a legend to the plot?

Value

A ggplot object
